TextView.android:text: Hi! I am a Full Stack Software Engineer focused on creating accessible, intuitive, beautiful apps. As a lifelong creative my first professional pursuit was in music, where I was fortunate to study with some of the world's most renowned artists and perform in major venues across the country. Always in search of new experiences and challenges, I decided to turn my attention to software development, where I can use my creative skills to build new and engaging experiences for users.

In the course of my musical training I developed strong proficiencies in problem solving, organization, autonomy, iteration, and critical thinking, all of which have come to be of great value as a solution-oriented developer. I enjoy building and creating things, and especially tackling problems and finding solutions to user needs. I enjoy collaborating with others and have extensive experience working in teams and pair-coding.

In my off-time I spend too much time on bicycles, explore the Colorado wilderness, travel to as many places as I can, enjoy and brew craft beer, and take pictures of all of the above. If you're interested in working with me, tap the 'Contact' button on the home screen!
